item.title: Policy officially takes over for Murphy as president/CEO at Packers' shareholders meeting
item.description: Ed Policy began his tenure as the Green Bay Packers’ president/CEO by paying tribute to his predecessor

item.title: Tea, an app for women to safely talk about men they date, has been breached, user IDs exposed
item.description: Tea, an app designed to let women safely discuss men they date has been breached, with thousands of selfies and photo IDs of users exposed, the compan...

item.title: Pura Scents recalling more than 850,000 diffuser covers as magnet issue may cause ingestion hazard
item.description: Pura Scents is recalling more than 850,000 diffuser covers because some magnets may detach and cause a possible ingestion hazard to children

item.title: European and Iranian diplomats meet in Istanbul as return of sanctions looms over nuclear deadlock
item.description: Talks between Iranian and European diplomats in Istanbul have ended with the sides agreeing to meet again to seek to unpick the deadlock over Tehran’s...

item.title: Female HR exec caught on Coldplay cam resigns after embrace with CEO went viral
item.description: Kristin Cabot, an executive at tech company Astronomer, has resigned after a viral video showed her embracing CEO Andy Byron at a Coldplay concert
